name: Mary_(Horne_residence)
text:
Mary (Horne residence)
Mary was present in Sylvia Horne's home the day Sylvia's son Johnny had an accident, running into a downstairs wall. As he was running through the house, Sylvia angrily shouted at Mary, asking what she was doing.
From the context, Mary may be one of Johnny's caregivers. Other characters named "Mary" are referenced in "Part 8" and "Part 12."
